casebody.data:
Farley Clark, by Guardian, &c., Respondent, v. Manuel Pomares, Appellant. Decided May 18, 1887. Appeal from a judgment entered in favor of plaintiff on verdict of a jury, and also from an order denying defendant’s motion for new trial. C. A. Moran, for respondent. Childs & Hull, for appellant.

Opinion by O’Gorman, J. Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Order denying motion for new trial,

and judgment affirmed, with costs.
